attribution
===========

v1.0
----

Initial release

- Generates changelog from git tags with hardcoded template and format

```
$ git shortlog -s v0.0...v1.0
     1	John Reese
```


v0.0
----

Placeholder release

- Name claimed on Github!

```
$ git shortlog -s 7441e33a9326e9c3e567600a0eda9732b259b833...v0.0
     1	John Reese
```
